title: Myntra Product Scraper
description: Scrape product listings from Myntra category or search pages (e.g., https://www.myntra.com/men-tshirts).

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: One or more Myntra category, listing, or search URLs to start scraping from.

maxItems.title: Max products
maxItems.description: Maximum number of products to collect across all pages.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to crawl per start URL.

requestDelaySecs.title: Request delay (seconds)
requestDelaySecs.description: Delay between page requests to reduce load on the target site.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping. Recommended for larger crawls (100+ products).
